sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react";
import {Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText, Row, Col} from "reactstrap";

const AddUser = () => {
	/*Creacion del objeto usuario */
	const [user, guardarUsuario] = useState({
		name: "",
		surname: "",
		email: "",
		password: "",
		birthday: "",
		country: "",
		image: "",
	});

	const actualizarState = (e) => {
		guardarUsuario({
			...user,
			[e.target.name]: e.target.value,
		});
	};

	return (
		<React.Fragment>
			<Form>
				<FormGroup>
					<Label for="fullname">Nombre completo</Label>
					<AvField
						name="fullname"
						placeholder="Nombre"
						type="text"
						errorMessage="Introduce un nombre válido"
						className="form-control"
						validate={{required: {value: true}}}
						id="fullname"
						onChange={actualizarState}
					/>
				</FormGroup>
				<FormGroup>
					<Label for="age">Edad</Label>
					<Input type="text" name="age" id="age" />
				</FormGroup>
				<Label for="gender">Sexo</Label>
				<FormGroup check>
					<Label check>
						<Input type="radio" name="gender" defaultChecked /> Masculino
					</Label>
				</FormGroup>
				<FormGroup check>
					<Label check>
						<Input type="radio" name="gender" /> Femenino
					</Label>
				</FormGroup>
				<FormGroup>
					<Label for="exampleSelect">Nivel de confianza</Label>
					<Input type="select" name="select" id="exampleSelect">
						<option>1</option>
						<option>2</option>
						<option>3</option>
						<option>4</option>
						<option>5</option>
					</Input>
				</FormGroup>
				<FormGroup className="mt-3">
					<FormGroup>
						<Label for="exampleFile">Foto del rostro</Label>
						<Input type="file" name="file" id="exampleFile" className="" />
						<FormText color="muted">Formatos permitidos: .jpg y .png</FormText>
					</FormGroup>
				</FormGroup>
			</Form>
		</React.Fragment>
	);
};

export default AddUser;
